text: mehi hetuva nam, niyata vasayenma pæhædili pratiharyayan samaga ovun venuven (yavana lada apage) dutayin ovun veta pæmineminma sitiyaha. ehet ovun nam, “(apa men) minisunda, apata rju margaya penvannan?” yayi pavasa (ovunva), ovun pratiksepa kara dæmuha. allahda (ovunva) gananayakata gatte næta. allah (ovungen) avasyatavayak novanneku vasayen ha prasamsaven yutteku vasayenda sitinneya
